document_data.caption: From left to right, a [[hkum yeng]], a [[Lu (nat)|lu]], and an [[einsaung]] nat.
document_data.name: Nat

Description.Hkum yeng: This nat radiated an aura of [[fear]].
Description.Lu (nat)|Lu: This nat was malicious and relished in inflicting harm to others.

document_data.Abilities: All nats had the innate ability to duplicate the effects of ''[[become invisible]]'', ''[[comprehend languages]]'', ''[[dancing blade]]'', ''[[deflection]]'', ''[[detect shapechanger]]'', ''[[dream vision]]'', ''[[ESP]]'', ''[[levitate]]'', ''[[passwall]]'', ''[[possess animal]]'', and ''[[quickgrowth]]'' spells at will. All nats were immune to disease and poison and had a resistance to electrical and fire-based spells.
